data.text: The intention was sincere, but we can’t skim past the fact that the decision was stupid...I respect fellow minister’s defending their friends, it’s what they’re suppose to do...but they still have to be held accountable of the way they represent our communities.

If you are going into the enemy’s home, you better come out with a peace agreement or you’re just gonna look like you waved the white flag for the people you’re representing..inturn legitimizing him and hurting us
talking bout you going to “bridge the gap”..but ya’ll just ended up drowning in the river.
